Slack is a communication platform we'll use to discuss specific topics outside of class. It also serves as a resource for students to ask questions and exchange information relevant to the course. You will receive an email with an invitation link to join the course Slack. For personal matters (only) you can email the professor.

# Set up

1. The address of our course slack is: 
https://ru-datasci4ling.slack.com. You should have received an email 
invitation to the course slack channel. If not you can click 
[here](https://join.slack.com/t/ru-datasci4ling/shared_invite/enQtMjkzNDI5NjcyMTc3LTQyZmU5ZGJjNDNkNTY0NzUxNjMwZGU2NzhmYzhiNjY4MWRhY2VjYTY1Mjc2NDhkNzJkYTMyNzJhYmMwNzI2NGQ).

2. Download the [mobile app][mobile] and/or [desktop apps][desktop] 
(optional)
